item.description:
The Game Den will be hosting a board game night on Wed the 17th from 6pm-10pm.

Bring your favorite game to play or use one of the many games available to use in the store.

The August 10th meetup featured SmallWorld and Red Dragon Inn amongst others.

This Month's Theme: The Ancient World

Games to expect:
Roll Through the Ages
7 Wonders
Peloponnes

And we'll have a Play-to-Win "Myth: Pantheons" (winner takes a copy of the game home).

I will be bringing Memoir '44 with me on the 17th to try it out, new players are welcome to give it a go.
item.how_to_find_us: In the brick building, can not really miss it.
item.name: Board Game Night at the Den
